Articles.Content:
I'm back to KSP and what I have in store is a fun challenge to make an APC that can optionally be amphibious for an extra challenge.**The APCs in water must be jet powered**APC's will be judged on creativity,weapons(stock-only!),design,and usefulness.In this challenge others judge you're craft and I will then based on their grading i will put it on the leader board.Now.Positions will shift depending on when it is made.The grading is on a 1-10 scale for each category(1-10 points).If you're APC happens to be lacking the graders will say it and say how many points shall be taken away.I want to have at least 2 grades for each APC before I put it on the leader board.My entry will be up soon.

Rules:

No F12 cheats.

Can have Kerbal Koundries mod but thats it.

Must have at least 2 wheels on each side.

Picture of it on runway at speed and in water(optional)

Jet powered in water.

Cool:cool:

Must have at least 3 stock missles one guided and 2 not.

Leader Board

1.

2.

3.

4.

5.

...

Finally this challenge is for FUN.Make sure to have it or else.

Edited February 14, 2015 by Polar Explorer
